languages.text: {n}Абеляр хмурится. Борьба военной выучки и обиды буквально читается на его лице, но выучка побеждает. Он чуть расправляет плечи, вскидывает подбородок и говорит более спокойным, серьезным голосом:{/n} "Не ожидал услышать такие слова после долгих лет службы. Но, полагаю, я сам навлек это на себя. Позвольте мне объясниться".

{n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。很显然，他的尊严受到了侮辱，但他受过的军事训练让他始终保持着克制态度。他微微耸了耸肩，扬起了下巴，以更加平静、更加严肃的声音开了口。{/n}“我从没想过，我服役这么多年之后会听到这样的话。不过，我认为是我自己招致了这样的结果。请允许我解释一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。很显然，他的尊严受到了侮辱，但他受过的军事训练让他始终保持着克制态度。他微微耸了耸肩，扬起了下巴，以更加平静、更加严肃的声音开了口。{/n}“我从没想过，我服役这么多年之后会听到这样的话。不过，我认为是我自己招致了这样的结果。请允许我解释一下。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño mientras su dignidad herida lucha con su entrenamiento militar, pero es este último el que se hace con la victoria. Se encoge de hombros rápidamente, alza la barbilla y habla con voz más tranquila y grave:{/n} «No esperaba oír esas palabras después de todos mis años de servicio, pero supongo que ha sido culpa mía. Permita que me explique».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

Se encoge de hombros rápidamente, alza la barbilla y habla con voz más tranquila y grave:{/n} «No esperaba oír esas palabras después de todos mis años de servicio, pero supongo que ha sido culpa mía. Permita que me explique».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめた。己の威厳と、戦時における軍事訓練の成果がせめぎあっていたようだが、後者が勝った。彼は少し肩をすくめ、あごを突き出し、落ち着いた、重々しい声でこう言った。{/n}「我の職務について、このような言葉をかけられるとは思ってもみませんでした。ですが、これは我が招いたことでしょう。説明をさせてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめた。己の威厳と、戦時における軍事訓練の成果がせめぎあっていたようだが、後者が勝った。彼は少し肩をすくめ、あごを突き出し、落ち着いた、重々しい声でこう言った。{/n}「我の職務について、このような言葉をかけられるとは思ってもみませんでした。ですが、これは我が招いたことでしょう。説明をさせてください」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn. Seine gekränkte Würde liegt offenkundig im Clinch mit seiner militärischen Ausbildung, doch Letztere gewinnt. Er zuckt leicht mit den Schultern, reckt das Kinn und spricht mit ruhigerer, ernsterer Stimme:{/n} "Ich hätte nie erwartet, nach all meinen Dienstjahren einmal solche Worte zu hören. Aber ich habe mir das wohl selbst zuzuschreiben. Gestattet mir, es zu erklären."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

Aber ich habe mir das wohl selbst zuzuschreiben. Gestattet mir, es zu erklären."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard se renfrogne, visiblement tiraillé entre son orgueil blessé et la discipline militaire qu'on lui a inculquée, mais c'est cette dernière qui finit par l'emporter. Avec un léger haussement d'épaules, il redresse le menton et reprend la parole d'une voix calme et profonde :{/n} « Je n'aurais jamais pensé entendre de tels propos après toutes ces années de bons et loyaux services, mais j'imagine que je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même. Permettez que je vous explique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."

Avec un léger haussement d'épaules, il redresse le menton et reprend la parole d'une voix calme et profonde :{/n} « Je n'aurais jamais pensé entendre de tels propos après toutes ces années de bons et loyaux services, mais j'imagine que je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même. Permettez que je vous explique. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor. Belli ki ayaklar altına alınmış itibarı, askerî eğitimiyle çatışma hâlinde. Ancak kazanan, ikincisi oluyor. Hafif silkelenip çenesini öne çıkarıyor. Derince, sakince bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bunca yıllık hizmetin ardından bunları mı duyacaktım... Gerçi hata bende. Açıklayayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns, his affronted dignity clearly at war with his military training, but the latter wins out. He shrugs slightly, juts out his chin, and speaks in a calmer, graver voice,{/n} "I never expected to hear such words after all my years of service. But I suppose I have brought this on myself. Allow me to explain."
